modules.description: This module provides low-level parsing primitives and buffer management for processing byte streams and structured data, including functions to read binary values (e.g., uint8), parse sequences, and handle errors during input consumption. It operates on data structures like buffers, strings, and input flows, supporting composable parser combinators to build complex parsing workflows. These capabilities are tailored for tasks such as extracting RPM package headers, validating binary metadata, and ensuring strict correctness in data transformation pipelines.

Reads RPM package metadata from a source stream with configurable size limits. Processes data using Eio's asynchronous I/O abstractions to parse RPM headers and payload information. Useful for inspecting RPM files directly from network streams or compressed archives without full extraction.

This module implements parsers for reading RPM package metadata from byte streams using Eio buffer abstractions. It provides functions to extract structured data such as package leads, header indices, null-terminated strings, and header entry values at specific offsets. These parsers support selective metadata extraction based on tag filters, enabling precise consumption of RPM headers and signatures from binary package files.

Reads RPM package metadata from a source stream with configurable size limits. Processes data using Eio's asynchronous I/O abstractions to parse RPM headers and payload information. Useful for inspecting RPM files directly from network streams or compressed archives without full extraction.

This module provides functions to parse and read RPM package metadata from byte streams using Eio, including structured extraction of headers, header indices, and payload information. It works with RPM package files, handling binary data through Eio buffer and stream abstractions with support for size limits and selective parsing. Concrete use cases include inspecting RPM packages directly from network streams or compressed archives, and extracting specific metadata fields without full file extraction.
